title: Goodhart's Law Isn't as Useful as You Might Think
excerpt: Goodhart's Law is useless. It tells you about a phenomenon, but it doesn't tell you how to solve it. We look at how organisations actually prevent Goodhart's Law, and illustrate this with Amazon's Weekly Business Review as an example.

title: The Amazon Weekly Business Review
excerpt: The authoritative guide on how Amazon does WBRs (from former exec Colin Bryar): how it works, how to do it, and how Amazon uses it to win.

title: Run Charts - Improvement | theCompleteMedic
excerpt: Create your first run chart and start interpreting your data using just four rules. Your go-to QI resource.

excerpt: Two principles on collecting data, from the field of Statistical Process Control. As with most principles in SPC, this is both simpler and more important than you might think.
